snippet: Hard numbers will wait until tomorrow but some viewers already complained about delays and about what they missed watching the Super Bowl online instead of on television.
abstract: Hard numbers will wait until tomorrow but some viewers already complained about delays and about what they missed watching the Super Bowl online instead of on television.
lead_paragraph: It had never been tried before: a live, legal Internet stream of television's biggest event, the Super Bowl.

headline.main: No Ads, No Madonna But NBC Calls Live Stream A Success
